title: Panel, 1770–80
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 171cm (67 1/2in.). Weft: 102cm (40) (seamed)
Height of block: 33cm (13in.)
Width of block: 24cm (9 1/2in.)
description: A woman following a horse or a mule towards a windmill in offset alignment. Flowers surrounding motif. Picottage background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 1770–80.
1770–80. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
